Name: MineDrill Redux
About the game: Drill, craft, upgrade and explore in MIneDrill Redux! After a disastrous rocket crash, drill down the earth to find ores that will help you rebuild your rocket and fly back home. Features: 12 types of ores to mine Crafting system Randomly generated worlds Drill upgrades based on items Enemies Treasures and caves Coming Soon: Full controller support Improved graphics and sounds More enemies and a better combat system Steam achievements A nice story
Meta Title: MineDrill Redux: Nov 2018, Fazzle and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MineDrill Redux? Check out the release date (Nov 2018), developer insights from Fazzle, and a complete game summary.
